member.name: T:MainThreadQueue
member.summary: Allows the execution of a function with the guarantee that it will run on Unity's mainthread.

member.name: M:MainThreadQueue.Initialize
member.summary: Stores the current thread ID, allowing enqueued functions to execute immediately if they were already on Unity's mainthread. Must be called from Unity's mainthread to work properly.

member.name: M:MainThreadQueue.ProcessQueue
member.summary: Runs all enqueued functions. Must be called from Unity's mainthread to work properly.

member.remarks: This method only works for storage of type FileStream

member.name: T:TwitchGame
member.summary: Encapsulates an ongoing game, with all its bombs, module cameras, HUDs etc.

member.name: T:CommandAttribute
member.summary: Marks a method as a command understood by the Twitch Plays system.

member.name: P:CommandAttribute.Regex
member.summary: A regular expression that matches all forms of the command. Note that which part of the command is matched against this regex depends on what type of command it is (global, module, bomb, or holdable).

member.name: P:CommandAttribute.AccessLevel
member.summary: Access level required to use this command.

member.name: P:CommandAttribute.AccessLevelAnarchy
member.summary: Access level required to use this command when anarchy mode is enabled.

member.name: M:CommandAttribute.#ctor(System.String,AccessLevel,AccessLevel)
member.summary: Constructor.

member.name: T:SolvedAllowedAttribute
member.summary: Marks a module command as a command that can be used even if the module is already solved.

member.name: T:ElevatorOnlyAttribute
member.summary: Specifies a bomb command or game command that can only be used in the Elevator room.

member.name: T:ElevatorDisallowedAttribute
member.summary: Specifies a bomb command or game command that cannot be used in the Elevator room.

member.name: T:DebuggingOnlyAttribute
member.summary: Specifies a command that can only be used if the EnableDebuggingCommands setting is enabled.
